column6: Convert refuse collection fleet to clean fuels

column28: There's a natural decline in green waste in 2022 (aka yard trimmings) tonnage due to drought. To address the drought issue, the City has put water restrictions in place to limit outdoor watering to 2x a week. Lack of water can stunt the growth of trees and plants. Some residents also responded to the drought issue by converting to waterwise landscaping with less vegetation. When there's less vegetation, less green waste would be generated.
